column3:
Kageel Ja would have you collect ingredients for a botanical tonic.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested materials to Kageel Ja.

<If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),16))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Mine <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/> near Ankledeep<Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/> to Kageel Ja</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),17))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Gather <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/> near Ankledeep<Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/> to Kageel Ja</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),18))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Catch <SheetEn(Item,1,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/> at Ankledeep<Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/> to Kageel Ja</If><Else/></If></If></If>.
The crops are coming along nicely for the most part, but I'm a little concerned for the few plants that aren't thriving quite as much.

I see some yellowing leaves here and there, some slow growers and the like... So after discussing the matter with Anggir, we've decided to make a vitalization tonic and I would like your help with gathering one of the prime ingredients.
The tonic we made for the struggling plants seems to be doing the trick, so I'd like to mix up some more for future use.
A quality tonic requires quality ingredients, however, and who better to procure them than you?
If you're in the vicinity of Ankledeep, you should be able to find deposits of the mineral dust we need. Watch your step out there!
If you're in the vicinity of Ankledeep, you should be able to harvest the viscous nectar we need. Watch your step out there!
If you find yourself at Ankledeep, you should be able to catch the particular thick-boned fish we need. Golden stonefly nymphs are the best bait to use, I hear.
Procurement of the mineral dust we need falls to you. It should be found somewhere around Ankledeep.
Procurement of the viscous nectar we need falls to you. It should be found somewhere around Ankledeep.
Procurement of the thick-boned fish we need falls to you. It should be found somewhere around Ankledeep and can be caught using golden stonefly nymphs as bait.
Any luck finding that tonic ingredient?
Yes, perfect. This will do nicely, thank you!

The tonic we make will help maintain the health of the plants themselves. We improved their surroundings─enriching the soil, adding compost, repelling insects and such─but nurturing the vegetables directly was something we were missing.
As Anggir lent her expertise to the process, I have high hopes for the tonic's ongoing effectiveness. I also hope to have your continued assistance should we need another batch of ingredients!
